author: Special Correspondent
text:
A day after a petition was filed in the Bombay High Court seeking a Special Investigation Team (SIT) probe into the death of actor Jiah Khan in 2013, a local court on Monday said the trial will be conducted by the state government and not the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI).

Unhappy with the CBI for declaring her daughter’s death as a suicide and not murder, Jiah’s mother Rabia Amin had moved HC seeking direction to enable the US Federal Bureau of Investigation to assist the SIT. In a parallel development, Special Judge Anju Shende said the state will conduct the trial and CBI should assist them.
title: State, not CBI, will conduct Jiah Khan murder trial: court
